channel.title: json on Random codewalks
channel.description: Recent content in json on Random codewalks

item.title: Comparing sizes of protobuf vs json
item.description: update: now comparing gzipped json vs gzipped protobuf Google Protobuffer is a binary format claiming to much more compact than json and other text-formats, but just how much less space does it require? Does it hold for large arrays of data? In this blogpost I will compare the sizes of the two formats. Test-data with array of tickers I will generate test-data with a home made tool, you can find it on github: https://github.
